Articles.Content:
Dont know if ur still after info about VAB crashes, but im too annoyed to play ksp atm, so ill spend time on this instead

KSP 1.1.3 1289. Clean verified steam install. I5-4300m. 8gb Ram. Nvidia 750m. Win7 64bit.

Was making a satellite in Vab when i made mistake, it was going to be easier to reload previous save than fiddle about, so i clicked to open and reload satellite and crash.!

Logs and craft files attached.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/4f2vrkc3pqzfslb/KSPlog.txt?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/dehn9zuvwhuggey/output_log.txt?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/gu76haj86sncw77/Polar Satellite A1.craft?dl=0

I dont expect answer or solution, but heres info if squad can use it, cheers.

Roll on 1.2 for EF's sake

I suffer from crashes only now and again in the VAB. My PC specs are about the same as yours. I find that if I'm selecting/deselecting parts too fast it crashes more often. Not sure if thats the problem but 1.2 will hopefully fix things. Ultimately,  I expect crashes in KSP.......many of them!!

5 hours ago, maceemiller said:

.....Snip.!....... Ultimately,  I expect crashes in KSP.......many of them!!

Yarp, thought the cause of crashes would be my flying tho, rather than ksp. lol

funny thing is, i have a separate ksp install just for mods, which was driving me bit mad with some strange behaviour, but hardly ever crashes, so i thought id take break and have a go at Stock vanilla version again, 5 - 10 mins in and boom.!  (shrugs & shakes head) im off to release some pent up aggression in Assetto Corsa (which runs awesome btw) 

the wait for hype train continues............

..............back, thought id give it another go, managed to build my satelite & launcher and launch it, but ksp crashed when my craft blew up.! fair enough, fired ksp up again, in vab load craft, move 1 staging and freeze & crash. logs attached.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/318z03dnh523ipe/output_logcrash.txt?dl=0

https://www.dropbox.com/s/2uu0q26z068u1u6/KSPcrash.txt?dl=0

This is fun. lol

Edited September 6, 2016 by Tr1gg3r
another crash.!
